sentence.Network_en: In 1986 more than three million were receiving unemployment benefit.
sentence.Network_cn: 1986年，有300多万人领取失业救济金。

sentence.Network_cn: 他因为收购偷来的废铁而入狱。

sentence.Network_en: He is making money and receiving free advertising to boot!
sentence.Network_cn: 他既挣了钱，又做了免费的广告！

字典中膺字的解释 ... (1) 担当,接受重任[ bear] (4) 接受[ receive] (2) 同本义[ chest].

entry.def: When you receive something, you get it after someone gives it to you or sends it to you.

example.ex: They will receive their awards at a ceremony in Stockholm...
example.tran: 他们会在斯德哥尔摩举行的仪式上接受颁奖。

example.ex: I received your letter of November 7.
example.tran: 我收到了你11月7日的来信。

entry.def: You can use receive to say that certain kinds of thing happen to someone. For example if they are injured, you can say that they received an injury.

example.ex: He received more of the blame than anyone when the plan failed to work...
example.tran: 计划失败后，他受到了比别人更多的指责。

example.ex: She was suffering from whiplash injuries received in a car crash.

entry.def: When you receive a visitor or a guest, you greet them.

example.ex: The following evening the duchess was again receiving guests...
example.tran: 第二天晚上公爵夫人又在会客。

example.ex: The shop assistant received me indifferently while leaning on a counter.
example.tran: 商店售货员靠在柜台上漫不经心地招呼我。

entry.def: If you say that something is received in a particular way, you mean that people react to it in that way.

example.ex: The resolution had been received with great disappointment within the PLO...
example.tran: 巴解组织内部对决议表现出极大失望。

example.ex: The proposals have been well received by many deputies.
example.tran: 这些提议在许多代表中反响不错。

entry.def: When a radio or television receives signals that are being transmitted, it picks them up and converts them into sound or pictures.

example.ex: The reception was a little faint but clear enough for him to receive the signal.
example.tran: 接收到的信号有点弱，但对他来说已够清晰，可以接收到。

entry.def: If someone receives stolen goods, they buy or are given things that have been stolen.

example.ex: He went to prison for receiving stolen scrap iron...
example.tran: 他因为收购偷来的废铁而入狱。

example.ex: He received the shoes when stolen, and then passed them on to the men who would sell them.
example.tran: 他接收偷盗的鞋子，然后把它们再转给那些销赃者。

entry.tran: 经历（不愉快的事情）；成为受害者
entry.def: If you are on the receiving end or at the receiving end of something unpleasant, you are the person that it happens to.

example.ex: You saw hate in their eyes and you were on the receiving end of that hate...
example.tran: 你在他们的眼睛里看到仇恨，而且你就是他们仇恨的对象。

example.ex: Bullying can indeed be distressing and frightening for those at the receiving end.
example.tran: 受到欺凌的人会真实地感到痛苦和害怕。

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our TV set...was receiving triple and quadruple shadow images.

Sentence.sentence: I look forward to receiving your application in writing in a day or two.

We will be busy receiving and sending messages.
